thread.title: Pearl Interactive Network Partners with ICF International for $250 Million Contract
thread.title_full: Pearl Interactive Network Partners with ICF International for $250 Million Contract - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Pearl Interactive Network Partners with ICF International for $250 Million Contract
text:
Pearl and ICF to provide digital media services for Center for Disease Control
Columbus, Ohio
Pearl Interactive Network, Inc. (Pearl), as a subcontractor, has teamed with ICF International (ICF) to win a 5-year, $250 million Flexible Order Award (FOA) for the Office of the Associate Director for Communication (OADC) to provide digital media solutions and support services for the Center for Disease Control (CDC).
Pearl will assist ICF in providing the CDC with support and staffing expertise across key areas of digital media management on its website and other digital channels; including strategy, technical support, content management, security, software design and development, project management, and 508 conformance services.
“Pearl and ICF have had a long and successful relationship providing support for several departments of HHS,” said Bill Errico, partner and executive VP, government practice for Pearl. “We pride ourselves in delivering what the client expects.”
“Pearl has been a trusted partner of ours for years, consistently delivering outstanding quality.” said Jon Moriarty, vice president with ICF’s Marketing and Interactive Technology division. “Their support for our nation’s challenged workforce brings a new dynamic to our relationship with CDC.”
For more information about Pearl Interactive Network, visit Pinsourcing.com .
About Pearl Interactive Network, Inc.
Pearl Interactive Network, Inc. is a Woman-Owned Small Business (WOSB) and a for-profit social enterprise that delivers virtual and client-site contact center staffing services to the federal government and insurance companies. Its services include back office support, administrative services, call center services , help desk, 508 remediation services , and sourcing . With 450 employees during peak hiring periods in 26 states, Pearl accesses a niche workforce of service-disabled veterans, veterans, military spouses, individuals with disabilities, and people living in geographically-challenged areas.
About ICF International
ICF International provides professional services and technology solutions that deliver beneficial impact in areas critical to the world's future. ICF is fluent in the language of change, whether driven by markets, technology, or policy. Since 1969, we have combined a passion for our work with deep industry expertise to tackle our clients' most important challenges. We partner with clients around the globe—advising, executing, innovating—to help them define and achieve success. Our more than 5,000 employees serve government and commercial clients from more than 70 offices worldwide. ICF's website is http://www.icfi.com .
